quote: Positive thinking will let you use the ability which you have, and that is awesome.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I am thankful for all of those who said NO to me. It’s because of them I’m doing it myself.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Leave the fireworks for those who cast no spark of their own.
author: Karen Abbott

quote: Enthusiasm is a kind of faith that has been set on fire.
author: George Matthew Adams

quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
author: Bob Marley

quote: If you want to be average, do what others do. If you want to be awesome, do what no one does.
author: Alexander Den Heijer

quote: I am awesome, amazing, beautiful and confident I don’t need someone to make me realize it!,
author: Unknown

quote: The best thing about being who you really are is that you simply cannot fail! Be you, be awesome and live awesomely.
author: Ricardo Housham

quote: It’s the imperfections that make things beautiful.
author: Jenny Han

quote: The Summer I Turned Pretty Flaws are awesome – so, ‘flawsome!’ I love making up a word.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: Beliefs have the power to create and the power to destroy. Human beings have the awesome ability to take any experience of their lives and create a meaning that disempowers them or one that can literally save their lives.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: If you want to be Awesome, you have to kick all the negative and boring people out of your life and arm yourself with awesomeness imbued with positivity, creativity and little bit of craziness.
author: Rajdeep Sarkar

quote: Be strong when you are weak. Be brave when you are scared. Be humble when you are victorious. Be badass everyday.
author: Unknown

quote: I’m a person who gets better with practice. Getting older is awesome – because you get more practice.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: Be awesome! Smile like a flower.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: I woke up and realized life is great and people are awesome and life is worth living.
author: Hulk Hogan

quote: People always tell you, ‘Be humble. Be humble.’ When was the last time someone told you to be amazing? Be great! Be great! Be awesome! Be awesome!
author: Kanye West

quote: I adore your anger and resentments; with such beauty, everything you do looks awesome.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: You are people with a present and with a future. Don’t muff the ball. Be excellent.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: You are way awesome than you think you are. Don’t forget about your awesomeness today.
author: Janna Cachola
